Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SAKAE CORPORATION Alc GEAR System for quantitative measurement of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood using immuno-turbidimetric spectrophotometry.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use for the quantitative measurement of percent hemoglobin A1c (%HbA1c) from finger-stick or venous whole blood collected in EDTA or sodium fluoride, to monitor long-term glycemic control in patients previously diagnosed with diabetes mellitus; not for screening or diagnosis of diabetes.
